configuration.name: 开工6个月未竣工项目--区域
configuration.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (c_region3=NULL OR c_region3='') THEN '未知' ELSE c_region3 END c_region3, CASE WHEN (c_region3=NULL OR c_region3='') THEN '未知' ELSE c_region3 END c_region3, COUNT(p.c_id) c_count FROM t_project p INNER JOIN t_customer c ON c.c_id=p.c_customer_id WHERE DATEDIFF(IFNULL(c_end_date,NOW()),IFNULL(p.c_begin_date,p.c_order_time))>180 AND 1=1 GROUP BY c.c_region3
